Actions.Name: Pay the Ferryman
Effects: Deals bonus damage for each valuables token the Ring Finger is holding. If the finger is holding 3 or more, is automatically a critical hit on hit (+[D]).
The Ring Finger may teleport 2 spaces before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Mug
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is slowed. If they have a valuables token, that foe takes [D], then the Ring Finger takes a valuables token.

Actions.Name: Blinding Bomb
Actions.Description: The Ring Finger throws a bomb at a cross 1 location in range 4. Characters within take [fray] damage and must save or become blinded.

Actions.Name: Drop Caltrops
Actions.Description: The Ring Finger creates a line 3 area of difficult terrain.
